NoInputPage Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for NoInputPage:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 print_page ()

Detailed Description

This class automatically adds the header and and footer, but the header does not contain an input form.

Normally pages using this class will define their own form in body_content().

Member Function Documentation

NoInputPage::print_page (  ) 

Print HTML output

Returns:
None
Print the page. This version includes the scale weight display as well as the head and body content from those methods. Javascript commands that have been requested via add_onload_command are all run on page load.

Reimplemented from BasicPage.
